root.name: MiniFlake
root.description: OverviewMIniFlake is a roguelike dungeon crawler that also includes an overworld areas. The game's visuals are in a style reminiscent of old grayscale terminals.The game is still is alpha; despite this, the game is currently available for purchase for PC and Mac via Desura. It has also been included in Indie Royale's Getaway Bundle.
